channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OAK-3558] oak-core imports every package with the optional resolution policy
item.description: The oak-core bundle declares that every imported package has an optional resolution policy. Because of this, the OSGi framework will not attempt to resolve any imported package, but will happily resolve the bundle even if some dependencies are missing. This may generate NoClassDefFoundError at runtime.
item.summary: oak-core imports every package with the optional resolution policy

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Below are the bnd reports for oak-core

With Optional Import

Import-Package

So oak-core has required dependency on following thirdparty jars

  • commons-io
  • slf4j
  • guava
  • commons-codec
Removed the optional clause in 1714724. oak-it-osgi is green!
